RiskController - Class in risk.controller
This class contains the card logic as well as it tales the phase from the RiskGameModel and displays when a player should put armies on unoccupied territory and when the army should be placed on the occupied territory.

RiskGameModel - Class in risk.model
This class consists the business logic of the entire game.It consists of all the phases of the game.

RiskMapPanelViewController - Class in risk.controller
This class is responsible for the MapPanelView.It is responsible for drawing lines connecting the nodes using the coordinate values from the mapfile.It also has the method for creating a fortify panel where user can select how many number of armies to move from one territory to another.
RiskMapPanelViewController() - Constructor for class risk.controller.RiskMapPanelViewController
 
RiskMapPanelViewController(RiskGameModel) - Constructor for class risk.controller.RiskMapPanelViewController
